programme.title: Don Matteo
programme.desc: Don Matteo is a thoroughly ordinary Catholic priest with an extraordinary ability to solve crimes. A theatrical company becomes paralyzed with fear and superstition after an accident at dress rehearsal. Italian with English subtitles.

programme.title: Martinique (Sn 3 Ep 5)
programme.desc: Part of a gorgeous collection of mysteries, each one set in a different, picturesque region of France. A forensics trainer lends a hand to a homicide case in Martinique that may shed light on her own family's past. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: Nicolas Le Floch
programme.sub-title: Nicolas Le Floch: The Grand Huntsman (Sn 1 Ep 6)
programme.desc: Paris, 1761. Parisian police commissioner Nicolas Le Floch works to find answers to mysterious crimes. The young Count Louis Charles Allas is found beheaded. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: Softie
programme.desc: Political activist Boniface "Softie" Mwangi runs for office in a regional Kenyan election, but running a clean campaign against corrupt opponents is an uphill battle when based on idealism alone.

programme.title: The Jump
programme.desc: In 1970, a Lithuanian sailor and would-be defector jumped off his Soviet vessel aboard a US Coast Guard Cutter, asking for asylum. His leap led to one of the biggest political muddles of the Cold War.
